text: Longuet-Higgins, a double-barrelled name, may refer to: *H. Christopher Longuet-Higgins (1923-2004), theoretical chemist and a cognitive scientist, elder brother to Michael *Michael S. Longuet-Higgins (1925-2016), mathematician and oceanographer, younger brother to Christopher ==See also== *Longuet *Higgins (surname) * Category:Compound surnames Category:English- language surnames
title: Longuet-Higgins
